edu.teamsa.gambit

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.teamsa.gambit.Player
      • edu.teamsa.gambit.User

  • public class User
extends Player
    Extends the Player class Methods for processing the User information, storing and retrieving the user information from a serialized file Processing the bank and the results of the game and the player's stats
    Author:
    Team Something Awesomes

        public void placeBet(int amount)
        Takes the amount of the user's bet and sets the currentBet value and then subtracts that amount from the bank

        Parameters:

      • getNetWinnings

        public int getNetWinnings()
        Returns:
        (moneyWon - moneyLost) - returns the net winning/losses by the user

      • save

        public void save()
        Saves the user's name and bank value out to a a file called Gambit.bj

      • load

        public void load()
        Loads a saved game and sets the user name and bank value. If a file is not found, it calls the save method and creates the file

      • createNewUser

        public void createNewUser()
        If there is no file found for the user - this method setups the user with default vaules and saves/creates the file
